sentences.sContent: Shipment from Shanghai to Singapore without partial shipment/transshipment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shipment from Shanghai to Singapore without partial shipment/transshipment.
sentences.sCn: 从上海装运到新加坡，不允许分批/转运。

sentences.sContent: Partial shipment or transshipment shall be permitted unless otherwise stated on the face hereof.
sentences.sContent_eng: Partial shipment or transshipment shall be permitted unless otherwise stated on the face hereof.
sentences.sCn: 应准许分批付运和转运，除非本合同正面另有规定。

sentences.sContent: We prefer direct sailings, as transshipment adds to the risk of damage and also delays arrival to some extent.
sentences.sContent_eng: We prefer direct sailings, as transshipment adds to the risk of damage and also delays arrival to some extent.
sentences.sCn: 我们宁愿直航，因为转运增加破损风险，也会因某些方面延迟抵达。
